content.webTitle: Football: Carvalho likely to miss FA Cup final

fields.headline: Carvalho Cup blow
fields.bodyText: Ricardo Carvalho has only a "1% chance" of being fit for Chelsea's FA Cup final against Manchester United at Wembley on May 19, according to Jose Mourinho. The Chelsea manager also confirmed that Michael Ballack, who defied his manager to fly to Germany for surgery, will be left out of the match. "Carvalho has a 1% chance, Ballack 0%," Mourinho said, adding that Didier Drogba was "suffering a lot" from an ankle injury but will be in the "best conditions" to be fit for the final.
